item.title: Fandango Source Available
item.dc:creator: Geoff Bowers
item.content:encoded:
Just a quick heads up that the Fandango source is up and available:

https://farcry.jira.com/wiki/display/FAN/Home

In addition to the great looking theme templates, Fandango includes a bunch of best practice examples of customisations to the FarCry Core. Â If you just want a sticky beak, then your best bet's the FarCry Express download rather than wrestling with a standard install.
